### Issue

Error messages like the following are not informative. 
```
[sajid@xrmlite spack]$ spack install python@3.6.5 %intel@18.0.3
==> Installing bzip2
==> Error: SyntaxError: invalid syntax (<string>, line 1)
SyntaxError: SyntaxError: invalid syntax (<string>, line 1)
/home/sajid/packages/spack/lib/spack/spack/build_environment.py:688, in child_process:
    27
    28                # build up some context from the offending package so we can
    29                # show that, too.
 >> 30                package_context = get_package_context(tb)
    31
    32                build_log = None
    33                if hasattr(pkg, 'log_path'):
```

### Enhancement proposal
Better sanity checking of the compilers.yaml to make sure error messages are more informative.
